body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Matthew Wright and the customer's name is Martha Young.  The conversation is about a random business (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Matthew Wright, and I am with Elite Accounting Solutions.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Martha. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm quite concerned about my recent billing statement.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Martha. Can you please provide me with the billing statement number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also confirm the last four digits of your social security number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Martha. I will look into your billing issue right away.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time today, Martha. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out.
